Class RegressionLineRenderer

java.lang.Object
com.arbergashi.charts.render.BaseRenderer
com.arbergashi.charts.render.analysis.RegressionLineRenderer
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChartRenderer
public final class RegressionLineRenderer extends BaseRenderer
Linear regression line renderer.

Computes a least-squares fit y = a + b*x and draws the resulting line across the visible plot bounds.

Performance: O(n) per render.

Since:
2024-06-01 Part of the Zero-Allocation Render Path. High-frequency execution safe.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Arber Gashi
